review: We love it!  We also have a fire stick, and a roku 3 which we need to get the NHL app.  The voice search works perfectly and the grandkids love playing the games they have on their kindle on the big screen. You really need the game controller which is sold separately in order to access the most games.  I have only one complaint that don't a effect most people.  I really wanted to buy this for a friend of mine that's elderly and I had just taught to stream video she is also blind and the fire tv don't have voiceover  the only streaming box that does is Apple  i am not a apple fan  but I did buy her one so she could watch Netflix but she couldn't watch amazon prime the apple tv is several years old and has accessibility  I would think that a device that's is no much better and newer would have this feature. I love amazon and hope they address this in the future
author: Kindle Customer

review: I was apprehensive about getting the Fire TV for my husband as a gift after reading the reviews about internet and TV compatibility problems.  But I decided to take a chance and order it.  We live "out in the sticks" in Kansas and use internet that is comparably slow to what we experience when we stay at hotels and with relatives.  I was betting that we'd have buffering issues.  Also, our TV is an old Vizio, and I wondered if that might cause problems.However, we've been using the Fire TV all weekend watching movies and TV shows and have no issues at all.  Once in a while there will be a pause of maybe 2-3 seconds but that doesn't occur often.Now I'm thinking that I made a mistake getting the Fire TV for my husband because the honey-do list won't get done!
author: Donna
